name: RGB_04 - Fluidity/Motion Dynamics
description:
An early 'glitch'/'psychedelic' piece, from April 2016. This video was created as a frame animation in Photoshop, using Actions to repeatedly perform a series of steps.

The white to black gradient in the middle of the video was used as a starting frame to generate two animations. One of these was reversed, causing the initial rainbow chaos to coalesce into this image.
